WARM UP
# install and library penguins package
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library(palmerpenguins)
penguins <- penguins
# find dimensions of data set
dim(penguins)
```
#find names of data columns (variables)
```{r}
names(penguins)
glimpse(penguins)
```

# find number of penguins sampled on each island, gives ouputs of frequency of each catagorical variable
```{r}
table(penguins$island)
# OR!!!
summary(penguins$island)
```


```{r}
mean(penguins$body_mass_g, na.rm=T)
```
